products.title: Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX71003. A contemporary dim-out blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric.
products.productdescription: Hive Plain Barley Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Hive Privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Hive Plain" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords punched through the face or back of the fabric.

products.title: Hive Silkweave Elephant Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Silkweave Elephant Pleated Skylight Blind in Brown. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
This textured fabric features a stripe within its pattern. Hive Silkweave would look in place in a kitchen or conservatory with added green plants to add to the bohemian feel. This fabric features a honey-combed structure, meaning the guide wires are hidden from view.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0118 Fabric Colour: Elephant Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Hive Silkweave Blackout Raven Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Silkweave Blackout Raven Pleated Skylight Blind in Black. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

products.title: Hive Plain Cellular Iron Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Plain Cellular Iron Pleated Skylight Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Hive Plain Celular range is available in many beautiful colours  and has a very elegant honeycomb texture. 
 
This grey skylight pleated blind is perfect to add style, elegance and freshness to any room in your home. This blind is the ideal choice for your skylight windows.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0072 Fabric Colour: Iron Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Matrix Blackout Silver Pleated Skylight Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Hive Blackout Matrix is a textured honey-combed pleated fabric.  Due to it's comb-structure, the guide wires are hidden within the blind, adding a cleaner finish to this lovely fabric.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0114 Fabric Colour: Silver Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Hive Blackout Hessian Pleated Skylight Blind
products.metadescription: Hive Blackout Hessian Pleated Skylight Blind in Cream. Made to measure from £57.74 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Pleated Skylight Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Hive Blackout range is available in many beautiful colours  and has a very elegant honeycomb texture. 
 
This cream skylight pleated blind will look great in any room in your home due to the neutral tone of the blind which will go with most decor.  This blind is perfect for the skylight blinds in your home.
 
 Product ID: DB-PLS0057 Fabric Colour: Hessian Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White rails and hardware with pull down tab and visible guide wires to support the blind fabric.     Control Type: Pull down tab - 100cm reach rod available at extra cost Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
